*   **Peripheral Blood Smear Interpretation:** A fundamental skill in hematology, involving the microscopic examination of blood cells to identify abnormalities in their morphology and number. She would be adept at recognizing various types of blood cells, including red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets, and identifying any deviations from normal. This skill would be crucial for diagnosing anemias, infections, and other hematological disorders.
